meta.description: Language labels and descriptions for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'vimeovideo'

languageKey.label: Vimeo Video
Video Settings
Vimeo URL
Paste the Vimeo video URL as it is.
Description (Caption)
Usually the description of the video content in few words.
Aspect Ratio
Changes video width and height ratio.
Autoplay
Starts video playback automatically on page load.
Show Inline Title
Shows information (title, etc.) from Vimeo.
Loop
Loops video endlessly.
